author: Paul Spoerry
comment: This was the second (of many now) watch face I've scooped up made by Tha PHLASH. Loving the design on this one. Some of the subtle touches like the metronome are hell-a- slick.   He has so many incredible designs. I can't help myself and switch them up constantly. If you have issues check his website/instructions first... if that doesn't work he is an EXTREMELY responsive developer. Two thumbs up and a Word Up to Tha PHLASH for some awesome designs.

author: Heather Lamb
comment: My good fortune continues with the koans.
title: If you want answers...you want IChing

author: Lance Stratton
comment: This developer & artist is still as always at the top of his game. Buy this watch face and support Tha cause.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up my Brother... its not the quantity of reviews, but the quality that matters. You Sir, are quality.

title: More awesomeness
